title: Is that "I'm sorry I'm late. I had a lot to learn from the real sign of protest.
subtitle: "I hope people know that it's okay to change your mind when they give you new evidence that clearly shows that you were wrong."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph of a protester at a demonstration in June 2020 shows Black Lives Mater at Bethel, Ohio, with a sign, "I'm sorry I'm late. I had so much to learn."
